title: Is there anything called super conscious mind? - Quora

response.answer_text: Meditation can lift you up into higher consciousness, but it's still consciousness. Society is superconscious. Subconsciousness is composed of the pieces of that which reflects consciousness, and superconsciousness is composed of multiple consciousnesses. For evidence, observe the accomplishments of society. Only possible with a society, and not only for the multiple bodies that come with it. Society is a living, growing entity, and it is superconscious. Connecting to it involves higher consciousness.
